title: Pretty Big Bug
body: There is currently a Huge bug with Caitlyn where if u stand in a bush and auto will stack your passive 2x which is a huge advantage in lane will it be fixed?

replies.body:
That is not a pretty big bug.

That is an intended gameplay feature that is indicated in the tooltip.

A pretty big bug is Kha'Zix.

Game breaking.
I bloody hope this is a bait...

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GOPbEOEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-29T08:01:46.477+0000)
>
> I bloody hope this is a bait...
that's intended. learn how a champ works before making a thread.
